name: Unbound DNS Service
description: Ensures the Unbound recursive DNS resolver is running and responsive.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active unbound 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then if service unbound status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart unbound 2>/dev/null || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then service unbound restart 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active unbound 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then if service unbound status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi; else echo ok; fi
